title: Our brands ♥ Podravka
text: Brands Our brands are recognizable and favourite on Croatian and foreign markets. High quality is guaranteed by excellent raw materials, modern technological processes and knowledge. Next to quality, they are distinguished by practicality and safety of every product. - Food brand no.1 in the region - - Unique mixture of spices - Products for preparation of desserts - Baby food and cereals - Digital assistant in the kitchen - Let's enjoy the best from nature - Leading bakery company in Slovenia - Treasury of healthy and tasty fish products - Special seasoning mix - More than one flavour! - Practical and nutritional instant soups - Crispy snacks - Rich choice of pasta - Instant cereals for children - The happy side of health! - Fish provided by the Adriatic sea - With respect to nature - Key ingredient in the kitchen! - Taste the experience - From the treasury of nature - Spice up your style - Čokolino – for big and small children
